title: Voltron Welo Etiquette
content:
How do we meet up with someone else for an impromptu meeting? When we want to quickly connect with someone, we should find them in the space and check Are they in a locked room ? Then wait until they are available Are they meeting with someone else? Consider knocking on the room rather than just jumping in How do we get some privacy for work? Lock your room Move to a room that has Media Disabled (MD) in the title (this can only be set by a space moderator) These rooms do not have video, voice, or audio functions Renaming Rooms How will we rename rooms to make our space more functional? What are the basic rooms most Welo spaces should have? A room for “Reception” (where guests land) A room for “Stepping Away” A room for “Working Side By Side” (Media Disabled) A room for “Co-Working” A room for “Your Manager” A room for “Waiting to Speak to Your Manager” A room for “In a Zoom Meeting” (Media Disabled) A room for “Regular Recurring Team Meetings”

Page Labels: virtual_agent
